title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: More zealous still, an Old Light Seceder hindat Eldinhope was wont on every alternate Sabbathto trudge all the way to Midlem, to hear a ministerof his own denomination.
